    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17708881">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17708881">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17708881">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17708881">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17708881" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17708882">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17708882">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17708882">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17708882">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17708882" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17708883">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17708883">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17708883">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17708883">
          <div id="boxatt17708883" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20805936">
              <a id="link_20805936" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordartonline.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805936,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18640055}); ">
               Oxford Art Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An expanding range of Oxford’s acclaimed art reference works: Grove Art Online, the Benezit Dictionary of Artists, the Encyclopedia of Aesthetics, The Oxford Companion to Western Art, and The Concise Oxford Dictionary of Art Terms, as well as many specially commissioned articles and bibliographies available exclusively online.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17708884">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17708884">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17708884">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17708884">
          <div id="boxatt17708884" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20805937">
              <a id="link_20805937" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805937,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20805937}); ">
               Trexler Library Catalog
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Catalog of all books and documents in Trexler Library at Muhlenberg College.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20805938">
              <a id="link_20805938" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805938,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20805938}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Many authors have placed their works in Google Books as a way to increase exposure and hopefully sell more copies of their works.  Any full text that appears may not be easy to extract or manipulate, and often only snippets are available for viewing online. Use the "Find in a Library" option to "request item" on interlibrary loan (you need to be "connected to the Muhlenberg Col Libr network" to do so).
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20805939">
              <a id="link_20805939" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805939,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12464693}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17708885">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17708885">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17708885">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles from art magazines or scholarly journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17708885">
          <div id="boxatt17708885" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20805943">
              <a id="link_20805943" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805943,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20805942">
              <a id="link_20805942" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aft,air" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805942,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728981}); ">
               Art Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index and selected full text from art periodicals, 1929-present. Full text journals include Architects' Journal, Art Bulletin, and Art Journal.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20805944">
              <a id="link_20805944" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805944,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20805941">
              <a id="link_20805941" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805941,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728724}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago. Includes over 200 journals specific to the study of art and architecture. Includes full text of African Arts, American Art, Archives of Asian Art, Bulletin-Metropolitan Museum of Art, and Burlington Magazine
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17708886">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17708886">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17708886">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles from newspapers and magazines "of the day"
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17708886">
          <div id="boxatt17708886" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20805947">
              <a id="link_20805947" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805947,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20805946">
              <a id="link_20805946" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805946,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20805945">
              <a id="link_20805945" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/discoveryoclc/34107580" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805945,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19275262}); ">
               New York Times Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Access to the archive of the New York Times from 1857-present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17708887">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17708887">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17708887">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Other primary sources (interviews, etc.)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17708887">
          <div id="boxatt17708887" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20805948">
              <a id="link_20805948" href="http://www.aaa.si.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20805948,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Art and Architecture Through the Ages', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20805948}); ">
               Archives of American Art
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               From the Smithsonian: more than 20 million letters, diaries and scrapbooks of artists, dealers, and collectors; manuscripts of critics and scholars; business and financial records of museums, galleries, schools, and associations; photographs of art world figures and events; sketches and sketchbooks; rare printed material; film, audio and video recordings; and the largest collection of oral histories anywhere on the subject of art—are a vital resource to anyone interested in American culture over the past 200 years.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4797172" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17708888">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17708888">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17708888">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17708888">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt17708888" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17708889">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17708889">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17708889">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content17708889">
          Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
          <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
           interlibrary loan
          </a>
          by filling out the appropriate form for
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illj~S0">
           articles
          </a>
          or
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illb~S0">
           books
          </a>
          .
          <div id="boxatt17708889" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
